scripts.dev:all: pnpm dlx concurrently -k -n api,web -c blue,green "pnpm run dev:api" "pnpm -C web dev"
scripts.test:e2e:open: node scripts/cli/poll-url.js "$CYPRESS_API_HEALTH_URL" 200 60 || true && node scripts/cli/poll-url.js "$CYPRESS_BASE_URL" 200 60 || true && pnpm exec cypress open --config-file e2e/cypress.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:run: node scripts/cli/poll-url.js "$CYPRESS_API_HEALTH_URL" 200 60 || true && node scripts/cli/poll-url.js "$CYPRESS_BASE_URL" 200 60 || true && xvfb-run -a pnpm exec cypress run --config-file e2e/cypress.config.ts
scripts.e2e:mock: VITE_USE_MOCKS=1 pnpm run web:build && VITE_USE_MOCKS=1 pnpm run web:preview & node scripts/cli/poll-url.js http://localhost:5173 200 60 && CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5173 CYPRESS_USE_MOCKS=1 pnpm run test:e2e:run
scripts.e2e:live: VITE_USE_MOCKS=0 pnpm run web:build && VITE_USE_MOCKS=0 pnpm run web:preview & node scripts/cli/poll-url.js http://localhost:5173 200 60 && CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5173 CYPRESS_USE_MOCKS=0 pnpm run test:e2e:run
scripts.stop:all: echo 'Implement stopping processes by PID/port if desired'
